remarks.para:
The signature of the web method should be TReturn MethodName(string[] parentKeys). The array passed to it contains one value for each parent in the hierarchy. The value of the parent is defined by property of the parent control.
The first element in the array is the value of the top most visible parent.
The return value TReturn of the web method depends on the type of the input control which needs to be filled.

listheader.description: Return value of the Web Method

item.description: boolean. Strings and numbers are also accepted but javascript boolean rules apply. Empty strings and 0 numbers evaluate to false.
